name: DCCells
body:
This project aims to model the interactions of dormant cancer cells with the bone environment. The aim is to develop a agent-based multicellular model of the bone environment utilizing the framework [FLAME](http://www.flame.ac.uk/). Later-on a more detailed implementation of specific signaling networks will be integrated running ODE-based models of them in COPASI and connecting those to the cell agents.

The following figures illustrate the basic model and process layout
